import React from 'react' import Slider from 'react-slick' import ava01 from '../../assets/images/ava-1.jpg' import ava02 from '../../assets/images/ava-2.jpg' import ava03 from '../../assets/images/ava-3.jpg' const Testimonials = () => { const settings= { dots:true, infinite:true, autoplay:true, speed:1000, swipeToSlide:true, autoplaySpeed:2000, slidesToShow:3, responsive:[ { breakpoint:992, settings: { slidesToShow: 2, slidesToScroll: 1, infinite: true, dots: true, }, }, { breakpoint:576, settings: { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, }, }, ] } return (

Our accommodations were clean and comfortable, and the tour guides were knowledgeable and friendly. However, the transportation was a bit cramped and there were a few delays with our flights.

John Doe

Customer

We had an amazing time in Thailand and would highly recommend this tour to anyone looking for an adventure.The tour was well-organized and the itinerary was perfectly planned, allowing us to see all of the major viewpoints and attractions at the canyon. The highlight of the trip was definitely the sunset over the canyon - it was a moment that I will never forget.

Lia Franklin

Customer

I recently booked a trip through this travel website and I have to say I was blown away by the experience. From the user-friendly interface to the extensive range of destinations and activities to choose from, everything was top-notch. The booking process was smooth and hassle-free, and the customer service team was always available to answer any questions I had.

John Doe

Customer

During the trip, everything went according to plan and I was able to fully enjoy my vacation without any stress. Overall, I highly recommend this travel website to anyone looking for a fantastic travel experience.

Lia Franklin

Customer

My recent trip to the Grand Canyon was simply breathtaking! The sheer magnitude and beauty of the canyon is something that everyone needs to experience at least once in their lifetime. Our tour guide was knowledgeable and engaging, and he provided us with a wealth of information about the history and geology of the area.

John Doe

Customer

 ) } export default Testimonials
